Text:
very nice. But I'd call it 200 castles and historic buildings. A good many are not castles, or even anything like one.

Still a nice set of wallpapers. Thanks
You're welcome. There are some catedrals and historical places too, that's true. I was going to upload them in another pack but decided to include them in this one. Thanks for your comment.

many of the non-castles are still called castles as they were originally built as fortified or defensable buildings.  not all forts and castles are thick stone walls and towers, many are just heavily guarded, so to me the name fits.
